modules.name: Patient Management
modules.description: Comprehensive patient registration, profile management, medical history, and document handling for healthcare organizations.
modules.businessValue: Centralizes patient data for efficient care coordination, reduces duplicate records, and ensures regulatory compliance with healthcare data standards.

features.name: Patient Registration
features.description: Register new patients with personal, contact, and emergency information

features.name: Patient Search & Lookup
features.description: Search patients by name, ID, phone, or Emirates ID

features.name: Medical History Management
features.description: Track allergies, chronic conditions, surgeries, and family history

features.name: Document Management
features.description: Upload, categorize, and manage patient documents (ID, insurance, referrals)

features.name: Insurance Information
features.description: Manage insurance provider details, policy numbers, and coverage verification

modules.name: Appointments
modules.description: Complete appointment scheduling system with booking, rescheduling, cancellation, check-in, waitlist, and recurring appointment management.
modules.businessValue: Optimizes provider utilization, reduces no-shows with automated reminders, and improves patient satisfaction through seamless scheduling.

features.name: Appointment Booking
features.description: Schedule appointments with provider, specialty, and time slot selection

features.name: Appointment Rescheduling
features.description: Modify existing appointment date and time

features.name: Patient Check-in
features.description: Check in patients on arrival and notify providers

modules.name: Clinical Visits
modules.description: Full clinical encounter management including patient intake, vitals recording, examinations, diagnosis, prescriptions, treatment plans, and referrals.
modules.businessValue: Streamlines clinical workflows, ensures complete documentation for billing and compliance, and supports evidence-based care decisions.

features.name: Patient Intake & Vitals
features.description: Record vital signs (BP, temperature, pulse, weight, height, BMI, O2 sat)

features.name: Diagnosis Entry
features.description: ICD-10 coded diagnosis with primary/secondary classification

features.name: Treatment Plan Creation
features.description: Comprehensive treatment planning with goals and follow-ups

modules.name: Laboratory
modules.description: Complete laboratory management including order creation, specimen collection, processing, result entry, validation, and reporting with quality control.
modules.businessValue: Ensures accurate lab results with QC workflows, reduces turnaround time, and integrates seamlessly with clinical workflows for faster diagnosis.

features.name: Lab Order Creation
features.description: Order lab tests with clinical priority and indications

features.name: Specimen Collection
features.description: Record specimen collection with barcode labeling

features.name: Result Entry & Validation
features.description: Enter results with reference ranges and abnormal flagging

modules.name: Radiology
modules.description: Medical imaging management with DICOM integration, order management, patient preparation, image acquisition, interpretation, and critical finding alerts.
modules.businessValue: Streamlines imaging workflows, enables rapid radiologist review with DICOM viewer, and ensures critical findings are communicated immediately.

features.name: Imaging Order Creation
features.description: Order X-ray, CT, MRI, ultrasound with clinical indications

features.name: Image Acquisition
features.description: Capture images and upload to PACS

modules.name: Pharmacy
modules.description: Complete pharmacy operations including prescription receipt, verification, medication dispensing, patient counseling, and controlled substance management.
modules.businessValue: Ensures medication safety with interaction checking, manages controlled substances compliantly, and optimizes pharmacy inventory.

modules.name: Financial Management
modules.description: Complete financial operations including invoicing, payment processing, insurance claims, accounts receivable, expense management, and financial reporting.
modules.businessValue: Maximizes revenue capture, accelerates payment collection, streamlines insurance billing, and provides financial visibility for decision making.

features.name: Invoice Generation
features.description: Create invoices with procedure codes and taxes

features.name: Payment Processing
features.description: Process cash, card, and insurance payments

modules.name: Inventory Management
modules.description: Complete inventory control including stock receipt, transfers, adjustments, purchase orders, and inventory audits across multiple locations.
modules.businessValue: Prevents stockouts, reduces waste from expiration, optimizes purchasing, and provides visibility across all storage locations.

modules.name: HR Management
modules.description: Human resources management including employee onboarding, attendance tracking, leave management, performance evaluations, and training programs.
modules.businessValue: Streamlines HR operations, ensures compliance with labor regulations, tracks employee performance, and manages workforce development.

modules.name: Payroll
modules.description: Complete payroll processing including salary configuration, payroll calculation, payslip generation, overtime, and loan management.
modules.businessValue: Automates payroll processing, ensures accurate calculations with tax compliance, and provides employee self-service for payslips.

modules.name: Marketing
modules.description: Marketing operations including campaign management, lead tracking, promotions, referral programs, email marketing, and analytics.
modules.businessValue: Drives patient acquisition, tracks marketing ROI, manages referral programs, and provides insights for marketing optimization.

modules.name: Workflow Engine
modules.description: Business process automation with visual workflow designer, task management, approval workflows, and process monitoring.
modules.businessValue: Automates routine processes, ensures consistent execution, provides visibility into process status, and enables continuous improvement.

modules.name: Patient Portal
modules.description: Patient self-service portal for appointment booking, medical records access, prescription refills, secure messaging, and online payments.
modules.businessValue: Improves patient engagement, reduces staff workload for routine tasks, and provides 24/7 access to health information.

features.name: View Medical Records
features.description: Access visit summaries, lab results, prescriptions

modules.name: Multi-Tenancy
modules.description: Multi-organization platform management including tenant provisioning, company setup, branch configuration, user management, and subscription management.
modules.businessValue: Enables scalable SaaS deployment, isolates tenant data, allows per-tenant customization, and manages subscriptions.

features.name: Branch Configuration
features.description: Set up branches with operating hours

modules.name: Analytics & Reporting
modules.description: Business intelligence with customizable dashboards, custom report builder, scheduled reports, data export, and KPI monitoring.
modules.businessValue: Provides actionable insights for decision making, tracks KPIs, enables data-driven management, and supports compliance reporting.

features.name: Custom Report Creation
features.description: Build custom reports with report designer

features.name: Data Export
features.description: Export data to Excel, CSV, PDF

modules.name: Security & Audit
modules.description: Security management including user access review, audit logging, password policies, security incident response, and compliance reporting.
modules.businessValue: Ensures HIPAA compliance, tracks all data access, protects against unauthorized access, and provides audit trails for regulators.

features.name: Security Incident Response
features.description: Track and respond to security events

modules.description: Specialty-specific clinical modules for audiology, dental, cardiology, ophthalmology, orthopedics, pediatrics, OB/GYN, physiotherapy, oncology, and dialysis.
modules.businessValue: Provides specialty-specific workflows and documentation, supports specialized clinical requirements, and enables comprehensive care.
